description: Application for Non Material Amendment to Condition 2 (Approved plans) of planning permission ref: P2021/1479/S73 dated 31.05.2022. Amendment to wording of condition 2 to incorporate replacement drawings showing the instalaltion of an emergency escape door, access ramp and removal of planter at and adjacent to Block H.
site_name: Land North West Of Mount Pleasant Sorting Office
status: Called in by Secretary of State
